readme_banner.command: python banner_maker.py --title "Banner Maker" --subtitle "Customizable Project Banner Generator" --icon "logo.png" --bg "#1e3a8a:#1d4ed8:vertical" --pattern "squares:#dbeafe:15" --shape "wave:#3b82f6:32" --texture "metal:15" --effect "bloom:0.5" --rounded "15" --output "readme_banner.png"

linkedin_banner.command: python banner_maker.py --title "Onur Barlık" --subtitle "Senior Full Stack Developer • Innovation & Excellence" --bg "#0b1426:#1a2332:diagonal" --pattern "dots:#81c784:28" --shape "wave:#64b5f6:42" --texture "canvas:22" --effect "bloom:0.65" --rounded "18" --output "linkedin_banner.png"
